name: Human-powered spacecraft
description: A nostalgia-infused pixel clicker in a comedy wrapper.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Latest graphics drivers DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Latest graphics drivers DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
